item.title: The Greatest Play in the History of the World
item.author: Deniz Ak,
item.description: 3 stars A man wakes in the middle of the night to discover that the world has stopped. It was exactly 04:40. The title, intriguing and vague, leaves you wondering what the greatest play in the history of the world could possibly be. The Greatest Play in the History of the World written by Ian …

item.title: Birmingham Royal Ballet Mixed Bill: A three-course meal
item.author: Deniz Ak,
item.description: Birmingham Royal Ballet is on tour at Sadler’s Wells with a three-part mixed bill to suit anyone’s taste. Three separate pieces by different minds to dive into. The first piece, A Brief Nostalgia (directed by Jack Lister) is unsettling. Two large slates. One dancer. Her shadow cast on the wall …
